reviewText: An authoritative account of USMC Ops in the PTO. This collection is for the serious student of Marine Corps history. Using file footage with voice-over narrative, it proceeds through each op from WATCHTOWER to ICEBERG. I use this to prepare my notes for classroom instruction. The entertainment value is lacking for high school/ college level students. Also, it lacks in map/graph support for mission exposition. . However its first-rate for scholarly preparation, appreciation, and reflection.
I luv this!!! (Had to write something)  lol
Not sure about the product,  My friend had me order this product for her to give her mom for Christmas.  Did not get any feedback on the product.  But it did arrive quickly and was nicely packaged,
